Reviews.Title: “Very quiet location”

Reviews.Content: birthday present boyfriend didnt really know expect place arrived hotel nice gentleman take luggages room kind really helpfull nice well always helped us things wanted know rome far tourist attractions hotel supplied us maps knew going top thing hotel location close buses able get tourist attractions fault would say hotel showers hot cold dont work properly temperature water constantly changing isnt fault overall though think lovely hotel would return stay went back

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel, lovely location, great recommendation from others, thank you!”

Reviews.Content: booked another hotel rome website certain problem website hotels side things already booked yet allowed reservation go day received email original hotel stating problem telling astoria garden another one properties rome quick check tripadvisor agreed go along change rather look different accommodations far location rome hotel well situated close walking distance main termini station rome seems safe area far enough main street keep noise levels school across street entrance could bit noisy mornings graffiti school buildings front quit well read another review notes request rooms look onto garden rather street would agree room double small side seemed clean neat part bathroom clean find water temperature bathroom annoying constantly three long morning shower cold scalding hot freezing make start day less enjoyable stay front desk personnel helpful directions advice throughout stay spoke excellent english help poor italian skills amenities include area could relaxing place sit time luxury us trip say disappointed breakfast offered hotel fifth hotel trip far worst accommodations came breakfast cold offering far food much way appealing biggest shock us country wonderful coffee options hotel offered coffee vending type machine tasted horrible actually breakfast final two days worth time fix water temperature problems shower hotel pretty good deal even bad breakfast offerings

Reviews.Title: “amsterdam days”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: astoria garden lovely hotel assigned room right garden picture perfect also clean neat hotel staff nice tried help us whatever needed dont think ever get back rome would stay

Reviews.Title: “Lovely comfortable hotel in convenient location”
Reviews.Author: hmostlyharmless
Reviews.Content: hotel small side street short walk main termini station chose hotel hotels closer station reviewed noisy traffic problem homeless people true main street literally tourist buses taxis cars bikes day night long rome never stops 247 garden astoria small hotel neat clean set back side street feels almost like peaceful hustle bustle quite number steps front entrance triple room smallish two singles pushed together double separate single bed ground floor next reception desk noise problem window shutters needed school across road bit noisy students stood window waiting school open usually didnt bother us bathroom smallish new functional shower like red plastic bit dont pull alarm thought operated fan fan bit one didnt remote tv bit small room set high wall desk one chair heater room bathroom must either really really hot working requested extra blankets staff got straight away tea coffee making facilities buy coffee numerous cafes nearby approx 2 euro stand counter ridiculous euro sit thats coffee lousy couldnt wait get back australia decent cafe hotel also offers small sitting area bar lovely garden fruit trees breakfast room downstairs offered small self serve buffet basic pastries cold meats cheese etc best arrived early later morning choices became quite limited orange juice actually cordial coffee okay could eat much liked need leave key reception leaving hotel anytime meant couldnt lose suppose lot smaller hotels europe like leave key reception 5 night stay hotel great location good busy days sightseeing lovely return quiet generally able main sights except vatican city otherwise metro literally 5mins away watch especially dont travel peak times numerous restaurants nearby best pizza restaurant across road termini roman pizza like flat bread hardly pretty look pizza places actual ask extra supermarket within 5 mins walk get bottled water fruit toiletries etc internet access hotel street offers internet use charge per hr reception staff helpful speak english doorman helpful one owners help dont know whether wanted tip gave one anyway dont know whether speaks english either smiles alot hotel would without hotel offers good value money close railway station nice family feel request room looks onto garden rather look hotels web site booking sometimes offer better deal

Reviews.Content: recently returned rome blast hotel perfect location close enough termini close easy enough find cab long know street piazza staff friendly helpful odd thing turn room key went day figure key hotel name room number lose room small compared standards europe everyone rooms small even stage room really sure cute shower great great pressure great temperature garden beautiful wish could picked oranges find downside hotel would school directly across street hear kids theyre outside morning didnt really bother us would definately stay

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Location”
Reviews.Author: sandy m
Reviews.Content: excellent small hotel location near bus rail stations staff helpful hotel clean situated near good restaurants able walk main tourist sites would certainly stay melrose

Reviews.Content: hotels best feature location perfect combination sightseeing airport transfers 5 min walk termini station sightseeing also coach transfers hotel staff helpful attentive hotel spotless rooms cleaned well daily basis little new immaculate room reasonable size bed comfy tv small attached high wall bed hard watch dont come rome watch tv room got cold night aircon seemed cold cold different room perfect room light traffic noise children outside school opposite never issue hotel elevator although never felt 100 sure going get us second floor also really nice looking rear garden wouldve lovely breakfast buffet style basic juice cordial type amount thought going free breakfast area around termini north full restaurants eating shopping even fairly inexpensive supermarket 75 metres hotel want stock cheap

Reviews.Content: wife budget travelers wed rather spend less accomodations trip important us explore location offer spend time hotel room lot hotel searching weeks least hundred astoria garden checked hotels even private apartments rented said basic requirements private bathroom would like breakfast included room read reviews tripadvisor till learned european breakfast americans might consider light snack find cheap room near sights reasonable breakfast astoria garden met much one places reviews read actually includes meat cheese breakfast limit much eat mostly cereal coffee juice bread pastry fruit eggs bacon sausage toast pancakes would several cups coffee couple ham cheese italian bread start day fine unlike several reviews found room quite large room nearest front desk first floor ceiling bed think queen size plus chair opened cot mattress used 4 month old daughter sleep paid expedia stay nov 2006 bathroom nice corner shower plenty clean towels replaced daily desk staff excellent helpful even though speak italian speak much english even arranged us watch daughter room went vatican tour absolutely children 15 age astoria garden 1015 minute walk coliseum probably within walking distance major sites feel unsafe time day night walking around area termini train station 5 minute walk hotel express train take airport 11 euros per person way trains take within walking distance rome location including vatican several tour buses also begin end tours termini station central transportation hub rome well worth close fit walking around city first day glad near termini grab day pass train maybe finding place maybe much better money dont know stayed rome would hesitate call astoria garden first

Reviews.Title: “Good location, lower standard, higher price”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: good location close termini station close also another modern tube station available nearby pretty good area easy get sightseeing places walking distance colloseum room small clean except smelling day arrival brought beginning also could get curtains stayed fixed moving big deal december turns dark early turn lights anyway still later everything turned ok especially enjoyed bathroom spotless modern plenty fresh towels various sizes breakfast basic really delicious queues trees garden staff friendly welcoming problem worth money

Reviews.Title: “Good value for a pleasant stay”
Reviews.Author: mankerholz
Reviews.Content: arrived astoria garden hotel earlier checkin room ready staff helpful providing maps directions etc room small exceptionally clean well presented bathroom brand new clean powerful shower even bidet wasnt expecting budget hotel paid per room per value french doors looking onto pretty garden pleasant 3 property hotel 35 min walk termini station come termini front entrance bus station turn right pass via right second right quiet side street area home lot due insisted getting cab back hotel rather walk round termini night highly recommended hotel great value money

Reviews.Title: “small room but very nice for a centrally located 75 euros a night”
Reviews.Author: whatyadoinsucka
Reviews.Content: tripadvisor member wife returned spending 4 nights sightseeing rome would everything regarding previous positive reviews except say yes beds quite hard least room although bathroom modern well appointed towel radiator made using wc little tricky trying avoid ones getting though would still recommend hotel positives far minor

Reviews.Title: “Clean, affordable, and comfortable.”
Reviews.Author: Danny S
Reviews.Content: australia returned six week trip europe accommodation rome oasis hotel astoria garden read couple negative reviews confident pleasantly surprised room 110 spacious clean kingsize bed bedside tables usually none maybe one window gave natural light bathroom adequate clean shower could actually move hotel conveniently situated close termini close walking distance though nice lounge bar area opens garden inviting place porter barman name gem manager desk staff friendly helpful breakfast held pleasant downstairs room fresh filling definitely recommend hotel anyone staying rome

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: NomadNorth
Reviews.Content: staff went way help us great stay room really nice cold great base great city breakfast enough keep day would reccomend hotel nice stay mid range budget traveller

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: xheatherxrfcx
Reviews.Content: hotel conveniently located near termini rail station found little else recommend rooms bathrooms clean noisy uncomfortable airconditioner either full blast bed case one needs open window course lets street noise even back facing garden breakfast room claustrophobic service surly best stayed 2 3 star hotels rome far comfortable less expensive

Reviews.Title: “Great location, great hotel.”
Reviews.Author: 0utlier
Reviews.Content: doors opened us arrival wed expected price central rome welcome recieved pleasing service excellent interior tasteful simple garden room stayed smaller anticipated clean tastefully fitted bathroom clean modern lots towels powerful shower room cleaned thoroughly day change towels garden door opened onto treasure orange trees quiet seating sun station five minutes walk away want take underground bus taxi restaurants near vicinity welcoming good value great base explore rome would definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable, quiet, clean and great location”
Reviews.Author: pipja
Reviews.Content: astoria gardens must rome although rooms little small side everything need comfortable stay including heating winter staff helpful friendly nothing much trouble breakfast adequate could eat much liked asked staff eat night tell go go great restaurant super value also around corner hotel close main station everything seems run smoothly certainly go back astoria gardens visit rome

Reviews.Title: “Decent hotel but won't be back!”
Reviews.Author: Feeno
Reviews.Content: hotel lovely location primarily residential area close trams lovely corner room comfortable beds high standard cleanliness excellent breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel in a quiet location”
Reviews.Author: jazzyjill_uk
Reviews.Content: booked hotel two middle aged women away days break reading recommendations others havent disappointed quiet street away main touristy places yet short stroll away everything steak restaurant street lovely walk day till six sat watching tv room booked privilege room great tea making dressing gowns slippers large bottle water everyday euros booked advance mercure site yes walls arent soundproofed old building wish would get better door rooms stop banging closed though allow guests stay breakfast bagel cafe great doesnt take cash doesnt normal english breakfast tea though walked walked great time would stay

Reviews.Title: “A bit different, in a good way!”
Reviews.Author: bearpackers
Reviews.Content: stayed three night break originally booked standard room upon arrival early monday decided take offer upgrading superior room extra per night room available immediately stayed room large room floor ceiling double aspect windows flooding room natural light lovely bathroom compact everything plenty amenities topped every day purchased four day pass trams within day realised easy use fact hotel slightly others means really quiet night sleep everything sparkling clean reception staff polite helpfull happy provide information go helping us print boarding passes mini breakfast one day sat bar area think served us charming wanted coffee etc problem ask didnt like packet coffee tray room problem within five minutes housekeeping presented milk put fridge like fact hotel decor different clean thank lovely stay

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel in quiet location.”
Reviews.Author: lilly_lulsgate
Reviews.Content: checked wife 3 young kids europe tours hotel spotless cosy value money important friendly helpful us tourists would like comment specifically front staff stay took time explain show us go sightseeing million

Reviews.Title: “Loved it!!!”
Reviews.Author: Joanna O
Reviews.Content: great place stay lovely staff clean rooms great sleep noise weekends centre amsterdam consider want closer dam square etc however short walk museums gogh etc park close tram stop takes city centre proper didnt breakfast seemed pricey us instead ate every several cafes etc nearby breakfast check website sell huge variety breads die plus coffees pastries croissants fruit etc also ate 1 lovely pub really nice priced food great place stop late evening returning hotel place liked de 28 serves typical dutch food reasonable price packed went saturday night fine dining food reminded british comfort food perhaps liked middle really lively good way area

Reviews.Title: “A great, quiet, central location.”
Reviews.Author: MarieGlasgow
Reviews.Content: hotel clean comfortable beds helpful staff location superb 3 tram stops dam square takes 7 minutes far enough away nice quiet area away hustle bustle centre amsterdam always pleased get back area hotel day centre good restaurants bars near hotel would recommend would stay

Reviews.Title: “A great shame”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: really enjoyed included breakfast traditional european high quality buffet barman friendly overly

Reviews.Title: “Simple but comfortable, in a great location”
Reviews.Author: Jeff940
Reviews.Content: great location charming room would highly recommend

Reviews.Title: “a bit smaller than expected”
Reviews.Author: yvette79
Reviews.Content: hotel good location quite close trams hotel quite simple star think rooms small dark cost quite high service offered

Reviews.Title: “Average”
Reviews.Author: frozensausage
Reviews.Content: mercure amsterdam arthur frommer provided pleasant stay recent work trip central location although bit main street slightly difficult find hotels near several tram lines within walking distance much city offer standard room standard european size small sufficient modern decor staff helpful recommend restaurants attractions transportation options taxis prompt called breakfast nice traditional offerings including freshly squeezed orange juice would say walls bit thin light sleeper plan spend lot time room day may suggest somewhere else

Reviews.Title: “nice hotel with great breakfast and excellent location”
Reviews.Author: Annelies W
Reviews.Content: rooms bathroom ideal short weekend away bed comfy general condition nearly new one poor point reception cannot room allocated 2 3pm luggage storage offered unless upgrade 30 euros get room early assume hotel always full rooms free cleaned also tea coffee tray 5 euros regular traveller usually norm available within room rate

Reviews.Title: “Very acceptable central hotel.”
Reviews.Author: David793 Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights wanted stay near didnt want go budget hotel definitely beaten path far main areas plus quiet area peaceful walk around crowded tourists comfortable beds good size rooms bathrooms internet worked good great bagel cafe 3 blocks away around corner hotel wasnt amsterdam long didnt spend much time hotel needed bad walk get places would definitely stay however may want stay different area go back

Reviews.Title: “Clean, friendly service”
Reviews.Author: GRLTRAV
Reviews.Content: pros central station museum section nice bar basement reasonable late night snack decor reasonable breakfast free wireless clean reasonable rooms good helpful service cons small room thats pretty standard europe gym convenient breakfast spots walking distance expect hotel breakfast note room faced onto road appears construction happening side hotel make sure dont end side

Reviews.Title: “Great Twixmas Break”
Reviews.Author: Bowler10033
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel probably freezing weekend ever amsterdam 15 degrees also snow left hotel excellent arrived due airport delays man reception friendly helpful rooms warm cleanliness excellent rooms staff reception helpful excellent english downside paying tea bearing mind temperature probably wouldnt took option hadnt cold tv english spoken channels handy location great nice quiet area still close enough action figured going would definetly stay return amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Very good - but....”
Reviews.Author: Ingebun
Reviews.Content: stayed couple nights march 2012 room second floor really quite lovely clean modern stylish huge room storage space wardrobe ample two us didnâ€™t much luggage bed comfortable spotless although word warning anyone tall partner side even found bed bit short hanging end bed bathroom also really clean stylish complimentary toiletries nice touch room overlook building work going next door although view wonderful disturbed way thankfully didnâ€™t problem noisy pipes reported guests didnâ€™t breakfast stay canâ€™t comment make use hotel bar really well designed lovely ambiance prices really reasonable compared european hotels stayed staff dealt courteous polite happy help us found location hotel pretty much perfect us took 10 minutes walk dam square evenings yet itâ€™s far enough away itâ€™s surprisingly quiet peaceful city centre hotel itâ€™s easily within walking distance rijksmuseum heineken experience 10 minute tram ride away dam central station canal boat overall really donâ€™t bad word say place would recommend travelers good base explore city without paying top prices charged centrally based hotels

Reviews.Title: “Good choice”
Reviews.Author: markbryants
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights arthur frommer room 3rd floor facing street front hotel wed booked twin actually got room large double single lots room impressed cleanliness standard housekeeping beds comfortable ensuite whilst compact modern stylish featured large shower hot water plenty towels read reviews hotel im surprised people complained noise heard nothing neighbouring rooms could hear doors closing corridor certainly nothing cause problem street quiet nearby noise day honest nice sound anyway location terrific tram runs past end street pretty much walked everywhere takes 20 minutes walk walk quarter museum quarter youre steps away canal theres large supermarket block away everything might need several cafes restaurants within easy reach area felt safe even late night reception staff extremely helpful professional speak pretty impeccable english helped directions booking airport shuttle etc two 1 breakfast charged approx 18 euros pp per day got needed supermarket 2 tea tray room offered rate 5 euros day thought bit poor surely cant cost much put modest hospitality tray room nice able get hot drink want 2 reasons ive top marks

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money”
Reviews.Author: Wandering-Will-55
Reviews.Content: returned 2 night stay rooms small basically bed room much else beds rooms clean two us rooms ground floor found noise reception annoying noise seemed travel along corridor clearly felt though someone right outside room also got woken banging noise seemed coming heating system pipes staff helpful friendly accommodating hotel somewhat nice hotel wouldnt opt stay

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic hotel in great location”
Reviews.Author: Ru84
Reviews.Content: returned 3 night stay hotel booked pleased choice whole hotel modern quiet neighbourhood room ground floor found plenty big enough bed comfy free wifi breakfast included deal excellent wide choice including hot items able fill days sightseeing staff pleasant helpful everywhere museums canals shops etc reach foot excellent tram service end road would take centre didnt want walk make sure meal steakhouse de leeuw street hotel lovely food youll probably need reservation quite small gets busy would certainly return hotel amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Our two day trip to Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: Joany46
Reviews.Content: hotel located quieter area amsterdam 5 min walk main action actually pretty good dont want around central amsterdam price great 70 room booked pretty early rooms little small beds comfy wifi little strange giving vouchers access numbers 24 hours still great option amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: 754Judy
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights pretty peaceful location within easy walking distance restaurants centre rooms clean modern quite small necessary pay extra tea coffee facilities day seemed incredibly mean room clean bed reasonably comfortable theres outside theres little noise times weekends quiet one downside pipes hotels central heating hear constant noise rooms radiator pipes even radiator switched

Reviews.Title: “Great Trip”
Reviews.Author: puddey
Reviews.Content: hotel excellent location close train station stops tram 10 min taxi close museums attractions visit amsterdam like walking everything within walking distance museums art galleries 40 min walk 10 min tram dont want walk far heineken museum around corner frank museum 15 min walk honestly couldnt imagine better location hotel lovely main roads nice quiet really good sleep disturbed noise rooms simply charming stays hotels look regardless nice change room lovely personal touch wasnt spacious amsterdam wouldnt expect lots space design room made lack space breakfast one morning although bit pricey reviews mention absolutely spoiled choice selection impressive much better members staff excellent helpful always simply nothing bad could say hotel stay everything lovely things eg location better expected definately book hotel next trip amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “What a great experience!”
Reviews.Author: J G
Reviews.Content: hotel within walking distance whole city didnt travel tram except arrival departure bed extremely comfy staff friendly helpful breakfast plentiful included deal room small adequate freezing city canals first time 15 years room warm cosy didnt experience radiator noises guests mentioned bar really welcome spot day night wines reasonably priced staff extremely friendly atmosphere relaxing room onto street yet absolutely problem kids started making noise around 9 point getting ready breakfast even wed lying kids wouldnt disturbed us noise much background nature id thoroughly recommend hotel family friends

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful city”
Reviews.Author: ConnemaraDoris
Reviews.Content: much wanted give hotel five stars long journey first night sleep night noise central heating cap work started 7am adjacent building site right outside window fully accept hotel control building work appears central heating problem known owners know experience management things difficult fix immediately staff changed room without hesitation fact remains lost whole nights sleep main point hotel feel money lost enjoyment days sightseeing would upset staying one night business next day room changed though noise whilst still able enjoy comfortable bed good spacious shower efficient friendly service hotel extremely clean tastefully decorated modern style situated peaceful residential area although attractions ten minutes away didnt try breakfast thought pay 5 euros per day basic teacoffee facility room rather odd maybe thats way things done overall good points bad points heating problem resolved building work completed next door easy five five would definitely come back unfortunately rate three stars advise visitors degree caution moment

Reviews.Title: “Perfect! Can't believe its not a 4*”
Reviews.Author: siannyx
Reviews.Content: rooms clean look nice works hotels central heating hear constant noise rooms radiator pipes even radiator switched stayed 4 nights moved rooms 3 times rooms problems light sleeper like hotel good also hear lot noise rooms walls thin

Reviews.Title: “really very nice”
Reviews.Author: GoetheNL
Reviews.Content: returned hotel stayed 5 days room bit small weve expected kept furniture around bed clean things bit shabby like shower working well door missing paint ok experience location well 5 tram stations dam square stroll noise hotel bit problem well window bit old couldnt close entirely staff ok must point guy working bar extremely rude wanting give cup hot water saying done work bar works midnight making sorts faces proper way didnt breakfast cant comment including bargain considering prices amsterdam really think could much better

Reviews.Title: “Quaint location, nice personnel, tiny rooms!”

Reviews.Content: imagine new three times price youre

Reviews.Title: “Superior 3 star accommodation”
Reviews.Author: Jean M Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: stayed triple room two nights hotel looks nice well located attractions walking distance breakfast perfect plenty healthy choices hotel rather noisy second night also double glass might noise street however slept well great beds

Reviews.Title: “Stylish hotel in quiet surroundings”
Reviews.Author: Londoner_W12
Reviews.Content: good location pleasant smallish hotel built around courtyard used base sightseeing dining small bar expensive buffet breakfast pretty ordinary powerful shower however hesitate use

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable, clean, close to downtown”

Reviews.Content: let start saying normally stay 4 5 star hotels group traveling 2 3 start bunch 3 stars booked triple 3 single beds given keys 2nd room 4 single beds 4 beds way crowded room managed using one beds hold luggage else put traveled carry size luggage items matter traveling 1 comfortable clean beds gets 5 star beds firm linens clean style white duvet modern date 2 room furnishings gets 2 star lights switches didnt match sockets alarm clock furniture old eg chair room odd since place could put something floor 3 bathroom gets 2 star bathroom could support one person shower curtain door tiny problems hot water additionally toilet located bathroom opposed hotels another room made slow mornings one person could use time additionally provided one tiny bar soap one shampoo time first person finished showering soap completely use face provide 4 location gets 3 star located tiny side street hard find upon first time hotel one would think would quiet unfortunately school one side garbage run two streets loud upon pick friday morning lastly going side hotel close light sleeper stay property however location wasnt bad terms proximity things wanted visit 5 transportation gets 4 star airport property easily accessible 3 means transportation taxi 45 euro bus 16 euro easy 16 24 25 5th stop walking purposes 10 minute walk museum district 20 minutes old city may also take tram lines fairly easy navigate card plenty restaurants close 6 service gets 3 star always one staff person desk typically wait turn friendly courteous certainly didnt go way concierge youre limited map provided word staff 7 price gets 2 star normal circumstances room however booked october december xmas stay figured paid support holiday week would given another star rates werent received 8 food never ate breakfast hotel offer breakfast 20 euros per person overall property fits description website

Reviews.Title: “Mostly good but the room was a little weird”
Reviews.Author: GuyWhoTravelsALot
Reviews.Content: returned great stay hotel arrived early hotel room ready reception kindly looked luggage whilst went explore area hotel set main city centre areas interest within walking distance impressed room comfortable bed good shower breakfast included package price exceptional freshly squeezed orange juice cereals cheeses fresh fruit kinds fresh bread well scrambled eggs bacon could also order freshly cooked fried eggs preferred english like teacoffee facilities room provided however could book facility 5 euros day good value cup coffee 3 euros local cafes overall great stay comfortable hotel friendly staff would definitely stay returning amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Loyalty program discount is apparently discretionary”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: hotel good staff friendly location quite good city close attractions able checked checking time asked whether would like leave luggage checked bed amazing pillows nice made want throw pillows home get one exactly like ones hotel tv channel maybe seems like never ending channels requested booked would like 1 double bed 1 single instead got 3 singles asked come got singles bed particular room given away well kinda attitude good im fussy next advised wifi available entire hotel didnt get room maybe room kinda underground wifi doesnt get area disturbing part went shower lot dead bugs floor seems maybe room hasnt clean get overall good stay bugs bathroom floor

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel, in central location”
Reviews.Author: P1pster
Reviews.Content: purchased hotel purchased room mercure hotel closed christmas booked mercure arthur frommer city center instead thank arthur frommer located within walking distance dam square rembrandt square rijksmuseum restaurants shopping canals furniture ok breakfast buffet pricey plenty alternatives staff spoke english well helpful overall pleased hotel would recommend anyone modest budget disappointed

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: Sue B
Reviews.Content: mercure confident nice clean room free internet excellent breakfast theres construction outside hotel made bit noisy fault hotel site accomodating professional rooms good rates charged furniture comfortable english tv added bonus location within walking distance city centre situated quiet setting away noise stress downtown

Reviews.Title: “Superb for a Solo Traveler”
Reviews.Author: PingConcordNH
Reviews.Content: hotel old buildings street tucked away centre amsterdam expecting usual hotel chain hotel one real character great feeling room room large great decor like old printed headboard reached high ceiling old furniture black stylish friendly staff great breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Good location”
Reviews.Author: dackchick
Reviews.Content: returned 2 night trip amsterdam staying excellent hotel hotel couldnt better spotless staff helpful caring efficient choice food served breakfast first class something tastes position also excellent main places visit walking distance would definately would recommending anyone

Reviews.Title: “BEWARE OF THE CAR PARK”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: stayed wonderful hotel two nights couldnt enjoyable stay placed charming street within walking distance canals shops attractions spotlessly clean trendy decor lovely bar restaurant staff efficient friendly would definitely recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great location at a reasonable price!”
Reviews.Author: benz37
Reviews.Content: spotlessly comfortable bed really nice stay likely use trams lot get 24hr pass 7 euro every time ride also get go station take look little voucher stand lobby got discount things including beautiful museum bags bar nice went couple nights staff good didnt breakfast many options nearby tried breakfast store really great value apart issue noisy heating couldnt fault hotel

Reviews.Title: “A very good choice”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: stayed two nights two girlfriends even managed find us room three single beds spotlessly clean tastefully decorated staff really couldnt enough assist bar lovely beds really comfortable although front hotel disturbed noise even though slept window open hotel lovely quiet spot within easy walking distance canals shops etc small negative comment would tea coffee making facilities room although available room service would definitely return would friends truly welcoming place rest head whilst enjoying beautiful city amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Excellent accomodation,quality breakfast”
Reviews.Author: golfer37
Reviews.Content: returned fab weekend amsterdam booked triple room initially reservations previous reviews plenty room bathroom nice modern however strong smell cigarette smoke slightly putting beds comfortable pillows thick duvet one thing let air conditioning hot night reason air con kept switching warm air night quite noisy trying sleep night people banging doors got thankfully packed ear plugs blocked everything hotel great location approx 15 min walk dam square happy day tram stop nearby used straight forward overall would recommend hotel think pot luck room get

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel close to centre but quiet & peaceful; staff helpful”
Reviews.Author: shauncoles
Reviews.Content: travelled weekend break four friends us female aged came amsterdam short weekend away wanted half decent hotel rather 1 2 hostels got central station find tram needed went trams 9 24 25 take near hotel 5 minute tram central station got tried work hotel asking local side street located situated quiet residential side street safe cosy place felt well presented got hotel 11am check 2pm aware basically checked minus getting shown rooms receptionist allowed us store bags day extremely helpful reception beautifully decorated chic unique elegant exploring city day got back hotel around 5pm shown rooms straight away bags rooms gorgeous ground floor would definitely recommend read reviews rooms higher smaller rooms perfectly spacious enough wonderfully decorated bathroom spotless modern huge shower mini bar safe room however use bed one ever stayed choice different pillows thick really didnt want leave morning try restaurant bar looked absolutely lovely decorated beautifully staff ever helpful allowed us store bags day departure since fly home 9pm rest day city also offered advice restaurants showed us maps get places great service overall hotel perfect weekend amsterdam even one night cheapest amsterdam also expensive think considering quality location priced well within walking distance main attractions want get tram quality hotel make worthwhile like said went one night getting trams stay whatsoever

Reviews.Title: “Good Value”
Reviews.Author: mat031
Reviews.Content: good surprise used charm hotels boutique hotels rather chain hotels warm welcome clean nice big room nice hot cold breakfast location well go offices go drink would hotel kind travellers amsterdam category comfort budget

Reviews.Title: “Great, Quiet Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: stay mercure location regularly since really like location ambiance old converted house quiet area thats center far enough arent thick central station traffic etc downside rooms really really small ive seen 3 theyre tiny rooms bath value considering room 200 euros monday night isnt best want nice clean hotel dont mind tiny spaces would recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great Base to visit Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: Andy0486
Reviews.Content: party four thoroughly enjoyed 4 nights stay mercure amsterdam arthur frommer late september 2011 earlier anticipated cruise ship arrived hotel several hours official checkin time surprise delight rooms ready us welcomed warmly friendly helpful staff appreciated assistance luggage bit difficult suitcases 7 8 stairs entrance street level reception area elevator least elevator 3 star hotel mercure amsterdam situated within central canal ring courtyard one main streets leading dam square pleasant 20 minutes walk away short ride tram stop close small grocery stores cafes restaurants found hotels vicinity splendid rijksmuseum van gogh museum within 10 minutes walking distance definitely convenient quiet yet central location rooms small nicely furnished decorated daily room service similarly bathrooms fairly new stylish modern fixtures shower case room ceiling besides risk head especially dark already limited space making literally tight fit wed room future occasion attractive small bar next breakfast room basement chance try piece de breakfast besides extensive buffet orange fresh fruit unusual welcome feature also hot machine various types coffee addition hot water breakfast provided good booking select breakfast rate otherwise charge quite high much appreciated computer guests use lobby area without charge well readily provided suggestions reception staff restaurants attractions tours transportation etc indeed pleasant memorable stay mercure

Reviews.Title: “Stay at Arthur Frommer”
Reviews.Author: Wing20 Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 6 nights business trip rooms small decorated good modern bathrooms comfy beds pillows hotel situated quiet residential street means get good nights sleep however youre far sights pleasant stroll along canals city centre breakfast good plenty choice good freshly squeezed orange juice hotel bar pricey nice drink heading evening staff helpful restaurant recommendations travel tips ill back

Reviews.Title: “It is Ok”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: chose hotel location staff polite helpful made sure make feel thoughtful detail hotel also give password wifi day dont every day ask another password computer printer use free room spacious clean special pillow 3 per person bed confortable shower constant temperature much normal door left bathroom little wet place quiet near every interesting points train station less 2 blocks find pub mini market restaurant hotel also park open space

Reviews.Title: “nice hotel, central location on a quiet spot”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: booked mercure wanted priced hotel far city center didnt expect great overall beat expectations room clean bed reasonably comfortable theres outside theres nice vibe around neighborhood little noise times personally found rather charming front desk staff cheerful helpful though must say didnt present particular overall thought good place stay said didnt love fact closet bathroom different level rest room accessible via metal staircase get middle night steep stairs slight amsterdam whole stairs ive ever seen plan trips bathroom room may one hotel arrangement didnt tell asked whether wanted probably would declined also would lot less beer first evening least got exercise night one thing remember stay keep address cab drivers without exception didnt know hotel mercure arthur frommer name 3 town hadnt address phone show never would known go bottom line would go back happily would avoid room value money better expected

Reviews.Title: “nice but expensive”

Reviews.Content: favorite guest business program member prepaid stay entered wrong club number arrived asked discount enter correct business card number hotel manager refused give program discount hotel management poor attitude toward customer appears management hotel looking give discount situation happened another accor hotel hotel manager happy provide discount beware enter club number booking hotel

Reviews.Title: “Boutique feel hotel without the boutique price tag”

Reviews.Content: large triple share room comfortable lovely staff quiet night lovely neighbourhood close transport safe

Reviews.Title: “Highly recommend, excellent hotel, but skip the breakfasts”

Reviews.Content: stayed three nights frommer september 2011 city center 100 yards busy street amazingly quiet night 100 walk brought tram stop could get center five minutes hotel closer rijksmuseum van gogh museum cat museum nearer dam breakfast cheap great variety youre early opens 630 bed comfy matter hotel return wife next year definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable hotel, pleasant district”
Reviews.Author: ArranBarcelona Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights pretty peaceful location within easy walking distance restaurants rooms clean modern quite small necessary pay extra tea coffee facilities day seemed incredibly mean parking expensive least available didnt really choice pay street parking also expensive never saw spare space told charges arrival wasnt surprise ate breakfast hotel last morning stay two price choices express 8 euros eaten bar full breakfast 16 euros eaten restaurant would say either options good value money amsterdam seem expensive compared others visited summary would recommend quality hotel prepared pay

Reviews.Title: “Good quality Hotel in a quiet residential area”
Reviews.Author: pabloboltonio
Reviews.Content: hotel situated quiet part city 20 minutes walk main tourist areas rather difficult find narrow streets worth effort overall happy experience except shock checkout charged 90 euros two days parking mention made time

Reviews.Title: “excellent area”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: nice hotel breakfast great nice variety food opens 630 every morning except sundays 7 rooms nice small standard rooms tea making real shame need

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel and very convenient ...”
Reviews.Author: myi4u
Reviews.Content: location convenient sightseeing get interesting places foot staff helpful friendly breakfast expensive although variety good meal drinks walls doors sound someone loudly floor hall disturbed even woken

Reviews.Title: “Mercure Arthur Frommer Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: vin1961 Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: small hotel small quiet side street amsterdam walk bit get central area didnt ever take long nice helpful staff good selection breakfast bar rooms bit tight family 3 child 17 manage fit extra bed without many problems never room anything sleeping way like quiet little beaten path perfect hotel would stay shuttle airport get take back cost inexpensive compared taxi

Reviews.Title: “Not sure why this hotel is not in the top 10 !”
Reviews.Author: lacuadra
Reviews.Content: good clean room clean hotel excellent staff incredibly helpful beginning stay end free wifi lobby room use handheld device laptop free code unlike hotels act like wifi 2011 wifi throughout hotel rooms free hotel room huge terribly small either want blocks heart action excellent choice youre probably 100 yards tram stop block grocery store even closer pubs restaurants stayed room 120 first floor elevator required good selection definitely stay im amsterdam may mediocre hotel since people hotels silly reasons however need nice clean reliable hotel good location best bet id love less expensive way people talk cleanliness etc less expensive hotels theres way id take risk thanks awesome stay

Reviews.Title: “A real Amsterdam gem...”
Reviews.Author: samartin26
Reviews.Content: really recommend hotel quiet hotel good rooms charming luxury comfortable bikes rent recommend close red light district residential place good service breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable / Quiet / Affordable”
Reviews.Author: martinmatousek
Reviews.Content: great hotel good quiet location easy walking rijksmuseum van gogh lots others good breakfast lots buffet food good location rooms layout bad lift street level stairs carry suitcases highly recommended stay go back

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights 6 friends found hotel better stayed mercure hotels generally cheap cheerful found hotel better expected staff friendly rooms smallish clean cleaned every day continental breakfast adequate exceptional fresh orange juice machine freshly required location quiet side street near enough hitting town good tram links although close enough walking one exceptional point managed leave cash room safe remembered checking however kept reception also near 50 yards good local steak restaurant steakhouse de leeuw

Reviews.Title: “nice hotel, noisy room”
Reviews.Author: Alessandro963
Reviews.Content: price bit hotels around area clean service excellent also good amsterdam lot places steep stairs one doesnt

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant accommodation”
Reviews.Author: Samsfantastic
Reviews.Content: good one night used hotel sleeping far away train station work problem room good know would winter may cold room big like everything holland

Reviews.Title: “'Winter in Amsterdam"”
Reviews.Author: Nevilledog
Reviews.Content: nice hotel friendly staff rooms big nicely decorated clean location hotel perfect want crazy tourist zone still close everything good breakfast buffet

Reviews.Title: “Nice quiet hotel, friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: GLCM87
Reviews.Content: room stay good good problem paying 2 nights bit pricy western europe otherwise happy nice location close centre silent neighbourhood

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: spent 3 nights great nice location nicest part town beautiful canals took room restored everything new confortable nice decoration good breakfast great friendly service 5 min walk rembrandt plain

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant, better stay than at the airport”
Reviews.Author: AlwaysSunnyPHL Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: hotel worst tiny 3rd floor room roof ceiling meant get around hardly room move without knocking legs furniture places put stuff window window room sealed unit could opened meant noisy ac avoid hot felt like public areas eg stained carpets corridors bits steps leading reception reception plates left corridor outside room day breakfast staff away plates standing around positives quiet location good residential district clean nicely designed breakfast room breakfast especially fresh fresh coffee pastries cleanliness public areas pillows large shower

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful Room, great with our 10 month old baby”
Reviews.Author: leilalaniado
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel may 2011 rooms modern clean beds ex excellent bathroom excellent restaurant breakfast little pricy staff helpful welcoming location bad little walk tram ride away tourist spots highly recommend would disappoint

Reviews.Title: “Noisy rooms & building work”
Reviews.Author: sigosling
Reviews.Content: hotel well situated quiet street building restored room comfortable clean staff friendly helpful free wifi available works well would recommend hotel business travellers tourists

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: carol_trower
Reviews.Content: stayed wife parents mother see quiet residential area near heineken brewery well located walk leidseplein 10 minutes advised carrying heavy cases convenient canal boat museum stop catch guaranteed seat line good quality furnishings contemporary look including big light 10 foot lamp shade joke bathroom shower lovely style tile print sink area facilities room take travel kettle got deal expedia breakfast included fantastic european lots choice could literally good hour freshly squeezed orange juice amazing small bar hotel looked cool didnt go instead went bar main street next canal fantastic full friendly drunk dutch locals really lively really friendly high hotel easy reach tram stops staff would stay

Reviews.Title: “Nice, clean, but a bit small and noisy”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: good points clean comfortable many languages spoken polite helpful staff quiet street close romantic canals friendly bars bad points breakfast overpriced slow delivery request coffee room 30 mins room smaller expected upgrade possible summary excellent hotel romantic visit amsterdam consider upgrading basic room

Reviews.Title: “Well-located, Comfortable Hotel”
Reviews.Author: drewandben
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel two nights sure whether say hotel expensive stay well price bit high look hotel prices amsterdam quite expensive room clean well toilet big room spacious enough however found hair still one pillows remote control dusty everything place except wont find kettle complimentary coffee tea matter fact rent 5 euros per day price paid bit disappointed city seems charge everything 50 cents per toilet entry 50 cents per strip didnt problem noise staffs helpful always smiling hotel convenient place less 5 mins walk nearest tram less 10 mins tram ride amsterdam city centre one tram stop away floating flower market near van gogh museum heineken experience 5 mins walk canal cruises around heineken experience overall pleased stay definitely staying go amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Nicely refurbished hotel”
Reviews.Author: GlamGranLondon
Reviews.Content: hotel ok good location per night parking charge extortionate also advised arrival rate included breakfast checked discovered wasnt pay per day wed eaten wed known rooms cleanliness fine

Reviews.Title: “great hotel!”
Reviews.Author: AGall0
Reviews.Content: hotel close tram far away noise located quiet street true gem less 5 minutes away action opinion located museum area tourist area dam trendy leidseplein within walking distance 10 min tram two blocks away staff courteous truly helpful even though

Reviews.Title: “Could be amazing, but what a let down”
Reviews.Author: Babelfish84
Reviews.Content: great hotel fantastic location hidden away mainly area minutes walk prinsengracht room decorated quiet comfortable bed bathroom facilities excellent tv number english speaking channels minibar well stocked overpriced gripe price hotel breakfast per person rather crazy opinion obviously didnt plenty local cafes nearby even supermarket vicinity wish purchase food go didnt sample downstairs bar looked smart id definitely recommend

Reviews.Title: “Nice, quiet, but EXTREMELY tiny rooms (even by European standards)”
Reviews.Author: markdafedman
Reviews.Content: want city hotel comfortable bed big breakfast great location arthur frommer great choice 5 min walk rembrandt sq 10 min sq ride tram central st stop away location romantic safe building residential sleep comfy bed soft linens rooms huge ok showers modern clean shower etc decor fresh especially carpet really cute check fast overly friendly decent enough breakfast included deal fabulous big selection breads pastries etc fresh fruits cold need overall stay pleasant next time back

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel choice”
Reviews.Author: sheddie70
Reviews.Content: stay hotel many times always staff book web site makes difficult book long stay 19 days broken say web site would let book one stay

Reviews.Title: “An excellent value hotel with a great location”
Reviews.Author: Libby08
Reviews.Content: spent 2 nights nice hotel well placed walking distance museums area clean run friendly staff unfortunately given 3 beds room 2nd floor spacious enough noisy though facing internal courtyard something must wrong heating system could clearly hear annoying coming inside wall time night like listening table match rome italy

Reviews.Title: “Lack of privacy and adequate room facilities”
Reviews.Author: lemaCheT
Reviews.Content: hotel excellent quiet street away red light district still walking distance main attractions hotel staff pleasant advantage 24 hour reception desk close breakfast spots museums restaurants definitely worth money

Reviews.Title: “Good rooms but mixed reception”
Reviews.Author: maimutzacelmare
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights november 2010 hotel tram line airport get brewery 3 block walk quiet street nice sleeping eat breakfast bagel coffee shop 2 blocks away also restaurants area 3 trams stops dam square front desk helpful map would stay rooms nice bathrooms nice

Reviews.Title: “should be a 4 star hotel”
Reviews.Author: kiwitraveller98
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights month hotel quiet residential street within 1015 minute walk main shopping areas etc rooms pretty spacious nice bright colour scheme given room 3rd floor cosy quiet fact didnt see guests breakfast served basement room wide range food available would recommend although think quite expensive included rate staff friendly lots info amsterdam downside hotel could see didnt anywhere eat room service restaurant along street hotel well places nearby though

Reviews.Title: “Stay in Historic Amsterdam, what a gem”
Reviews.Author: NickandEd
Reviews.Content: mercure arthur frommer located right edge city center making ideal hotel youre amsterdam work staff great facilities decent go winter rooms tend take long warm get chilly times overall decent hotel great value

Reviews.Title: “delightfully dutch decor and witty staff made for a great stay”
Reviews.Author: latte_fan
Reviews.Content: nice hotel staying near airport located quiet neighborhood within walking distance fun parts amsterdam cab ride youre familiar trolley services

Reviews.Title: “Low key. Good location. Quirky decor.”

Reviews.Content: smallest room dirty cleaning bed noisy room size experienced worst accor night

Reviews.Title: “Great location! Nice staff and cute rooms”
Reviews.Author: Yosoylatina
Reviews.Content: location mercure good located close three main canals centre amsterdam museum van 5 minute walk away heineken experience 10 minutes walk away dam square part city 2030 minute walk hotel however tram stop located almost outside hotel donâ€™t fancy walk rooms look like past years contemporary although perhaps little dark given lights room give much light walls painted dark blue problem day though large windows let plenty natural light flat screen tvs rooms safe teacoffee making facilities â€“ paid rate 5 euros day want facility wifi also extra 6 euros day require rooms perhaps little small european standards instance sitting desk work back chair end bed makes difficult sit get chair hand bathroom quite large â€“ bath shower whilst decorated nicely hotel could put little thought eg space sitting desk providing soap dish bathroom providing adequate room lighting staff hotel friendly helpful breakfast buffet included wide selection continental foods â€“ croissants pastries cereals breads cold meats cheese machine fruits etc also possible request scrambled fried eggs extra cost breakfast served morning helpful unfortunately stay let greatly building work opposite hotel private piece land awoken morning 3 nights stayed hotel 7am noise metal dropped sounds heavy see photos video bad chose hotel otherwise quiet location knew would awoken morning building work would stayed receptionist much longer building work would look least january 2011 suggest contact hotel prior booking also walls rooms seem thin possible hear people rooms either side talking night andor tried review hotel without towards issue building work building work stop point future however given rack rate hotel around euros 3 hotel issues size room thin walls etc rated hotel main advice really want stay please check hotel booking building work opposite

Reviews.Title: “Agreable hotel, but AWFULLY RUDE reception staff.”
Reviews.Author: Rewier
Reviews.Content: charming hotel quiet near many attractions areas entrance staff welcoming efficient bedroom allocated elegant high quality furnishings comfortable bed pillows warm duvet room facilites included mini bar flat screen tv shower room good size high standard cleanliness breakfast room well large variety food minor facility making toast

Reviews.Title: “Smashing hotel”
Reviews.Author: Larafro
Reviews.Content: hotel located quite centrally overly crowded area get day pass hop tram stops really close takes directly dam square cafes restaurants nearby 5 minutes walk actually everything quite close foot hotel nice clean check fine everyone friendly downside small rooms leave much room luggage bathroom fairly large quite space note school across street get room facing east hear screaming morning good value would go back

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: Budgie1975
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 4 nights comfortable cute affordable centrally located quiet street main street staff friendly helpful part yes room small didnt expect anything much larger europe b reviewers continue surprised therefore take time comment size hotel rooms abroad wed rather enjoy city outside hotel room didnt try breakfast read overpriced get anyway opted pancake houses instead cappuccino croissant nearby bakery business center simple point computer printer boarding pass printing looking comfortable clean centrally located hotel style found gay couple found friendly regard

Reviews.Title: “Loved the decor, very clean and great location”
Reviews.Author: SimiReading
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights recently hotel good quiet location easily accessible things either foot tram rooms nicely refurbished clean comfortable although bed bit hard room night hot couldnt really open window noise people passing late night courtyard behind room got good deal included breakfast fine plenty choice dont expect anything cooked apart hard boiled eggs recommend getting two day tram pass central station tourist information dont queue really quickly number system good idea go guided bus tour first choose places want visit ended missing couple last day

Reviews.Title: “Great budget place”
Reviews.Author: od1n13
Reviews.Content: visited hotel three times last two years always clean quiet excellent breakfast rooms second top floor also extremely charming big rooms ground floor small next service entry noisy price difference really first bookings get better rooms public transport close connects perfectly directly city center circle lines around city

Reviews.Title: “A very relaxing and comfortable experience.”
Reviews.Author: LondonMorgana
Reviews.Content: travel business amsterdam regularly generally get booked different hotel however occasion mistake made hotel booked couldnt refunded location good nice central takes walk tram journey right center town also cleanliness room outstanding cant fault decor bathroom quite funky thats positives end unfortunately given room absolutely tiny means big sat desk couldnt even get legs didnt want squeezed chair would bed space put anything claustrophobic certainly found lacking space also disappointed find single room bath showers room looking concrete wall across garbage pleasant also room next service stairs service lift late night early morning would create lot noise walls rooms thin hear everything bed amazingly comfortable due noise also rubbish sleep wasnt comfortable also hotel keycard next expect go back reception somehow went say wasnt working nobody checked name reservation asked room number went particularly secure bar always empty also food options bit let never went breakfast breakfast really worth better go albert heijn around corner buy housekeeping good though bed next morning everything clean experience would repeat current shape theyd need small could much better real shame

Reviews.Title: “Fair service, but not a great value”
Reviews.Author: rpolicicio
Reviews.Content: nice hotel although decor little wild nice location quiet overnight hours good restaurants within walking distance staff excellent professional courteous complaint rooms tiny yet could hold shower make rooms larger order change mind go hallway

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel near museum quarter”
Reviews.Author: griseldis
Reviews.Content: hotel located quiet side street outside main centre amsterdam within easy walking distance central area dam leidseplein museum area hotel public transport particularly tram direct lines central station 10 minutes 45 stops leidseplein 2 mins walk hotel clean modern interior room bathroom clean modern wide range tv channels several different languages quality sleep excellent quiet area although woken morning slamming doors whether guests cleaning staff sure take breakfast hotel 16 euros appeared quite steep hotel 1 internet terminal lobby used chance use slow however excellent choice hotel one popular cities europe

Reviews.Title: “Great Location for exploring Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: crossman
Reviews.Content: spent two nights hotel would recommend everybody wants amsterdam location near prinsengracht good 15 minutes walk dam central station also tram station 3 minutes walking distance hotel cosy rooms stylish well appointed bathroom big enough breakfast adequate category hotel bit expensive many nice cafes around corner get better cheaper breakfast whole hotel well room bathroom clean personnel friendly helpful good hotel fair price

Reviews.Title: “Alright location, refurbished rooms”
Reviews.Author: silverwolf22
Reviews.Content: room 3rd floor roof one side bed making hard get staff generally ok except cleaning staff ignored sign room chose make anyway didnt want made wanted privacy hotel time thats hardly point colour scheme room sort green colour sort odd really hotel nice quiet location seems residential close lots lots restaurants things see bit walk red light district could always get tram upset discover rate pay accor 4 inroom coffee facilities sign lift kindly offered us night thats reasonable hotel level

Reviews.Title: “Too dark, difficult internet connection,”
Reviews.Author: BRFlyerSP
Reviews.Content: rooms spacious find many hotels breakfast excellent location close enough everything kind let us get hotel early responsive requests however hotel reception best quirky times friendly times nasty person manager duty time ignore reception good experience

Reviews.Title: “Great ambience”
Reviews.Author: FrankOFile48
Reviews.Content: hotels amsterdam amsterdam expensive hotel great price quality nice modern 1 euro hop hop runs around stops anywhere close hotel well worth using hotel also really close factory worth staying

Reviews.Title: “Great base for seeing Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: UK1000
Reviews.Content: want stay historic amsterdam old amsterdam building tucked canals streets place rooms big windows high ceilings expect old amsterdam house light room bathrooms little compact everything need reception team helpful 15 minute walk leidseplein want tourist restaurants bars 2 minute walk nearest tram stop ate breakfast picked one many nearby buffet breakfast hotel eur 16 per person take day coffeetea making facilities

Reviews.Title: “newly renovated hotel”
Reviews.Author: Melb1985
Reviews.Content: stayed three nights april wouldnt hesitate stay next time im lucky enough amsterdam first hotel located near canal residential area evening plenty little restaurants cafes enjoy good meal best wont woken traffic pedestrian noise coming street hotel ten minute walk heineken experience minutes rijksmuseum van gogh museum direction 10 minute walk floating flower market tram stop one block hotel goes dam square central train station overall hotel good central location good transport links dont want walk hotel comfortable quirky dutch design sense rooms spacious double room almost felt lost due generous size even compared american hotel rooms furnishings plenty chair huge bed tv minibar working desk chair night stands ample lighting bathroom big enough share youre traveling someone sink nice tile like design wall tiles toilet shower decent sized never ran hot water water pressure mercure supplies plenty need bring soap shampoo found hotel room lack free wifi access fact wifi internet access crazy expensive hotel think around three hours wifi multiple add three hours use dont want pay internet access free lobby easily check email look anything may need know staying hotel peoples reviews mentioned reception staff rude friendly found exact opposite desk morning particular cool sense ability speak million languages whats like two reception helpful questions filled requests made stay didnt breakfast hotel im coffee pastry person morning big breakfasts

Reviews.Title: “Great location, very nice room”
Reviews.Author: chunich
Reviews.Content: took chain property quiet side street location modern quirky furniture created great hotel experience werent small mercure hotel sign wouldnt even know hotel walking distance heineken experience albert market walk dam square 20 min take 24 tram staff pleasant checked double third floor room modern including large bath fridge flat screen international channels shutters several wifi options available cheapest connection desk 9 euro per 24 hours theres small bar breakfast room simple ample

Reviews.Title: “Perfect”
Reviews.Author: AlbertodC
Reviews.Content: stayed property march 12 15 friend staff nice although one offered assist us bags entrance theres small flight stairs elevator tiny computer lobby internet free purchase wifi time via buy hour split time stay front desk manager nice enough print train confirmation asked printer public one room huge tiny comfortable us location wonderful within walking distance heineken experience main street catch tram supermarket nearby around corner places eat cost us 11 taxi ride centraal train station hotel would definitely stay didnt breakfast comment offer food

Reviews.Title: “A great night!”
Reviews.Author: Dave G
Reviews.Content: stayed mercure amsterdam arthur frommer 3 nights january 2010 stayed many times accor hotels whether sofitel mercure novotel never complain however mercure amsterdam arthur frommer deserves one took us 25 minutes checkin receptionist rude guest instead trying help caused guest complain even kind following guests including us guests front us gold members asked upgrade replied straight rude sorry asked basic info replied know rooms good modern excellent middle nicest canals checkout receptionist time loud man rude guest complained high extra charges apparently charge eur 20 parking eur 5 internet eur 10 coffe room 1 receptionist 6 guests checking guests wanted leave hotel considering queue receptionist could collected deposit later contrary rudely way guests left reception went store room far away came back looking quite upset queue getting longer entered room exit minute kept speaking loud everybody could hear guests name details nights stayed minibar movies watched short hotel rude reception staff come back

Reviews.Title: “Looked better on the website than in person.”
Reviews.Author: mckaykarenj
Reviews.Content: great little hotel posh essentials really well location great 20 30 minutes walk old town 10 minutes leidesplein quiet residential area much traffic noise rooms small nicely decorated staff always friendly helpful breakfast tasty double room 3 days including breakfast seemed like good deal would definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “A Great Location”
Reviews.Author: Doneit49
Reviews.Content: hotel located south centre amsterdam easily arrived trams 16 24 25 centraal station stop get appears safe area hotel 5 minute walk heineken experience service received fantastic main desk particularly helpful rooms cosy amsterdam sleeping two issues place firstly eat hotel breakfast time room service restaurant second issue tea coffee making facilities provided standard charged per day kettle etc

Reviews.Title: “Not So Much”
Reviews.Author: ERigby
Reviews.Content: location great safe area close public transport bars restaurants heineken experience supermarket rooms bright warm friendly feel free internet available lobby hotel staff friendly helpful hard pick hotel thing could think breakfast time could eat hotel especially dont want leave

Reviews.Title: “Noiisy and run down hotel in sweetlocation”
Reviews.Author: Marginwalker
Reviews.Content: location tucked away main street hotel really feels like part neighbourhood quiet quaint great location far anything easily accessible three tram lines 16 24 25 night dont want wait night bus always walk home well since amsterdam compact leidsplein area walked home 1520 mins morning every morning walked 510 mins flower market breakfast along canal cleanliness clean recently remodeled toilet fixtures tv desk etc great condition top floor roof problem walking around tall people might hit ceiling pc lobby everyone use free charge value hotel prices tend higher ams due limited availability mercure provides good balance value location facility overall happy stay cozy room without boring hotel feel

Reviews.Title: “Perfectly adequate hotel”
Reviews.Author: uncletony
Reviews.Content: booked hotel orbitz got great deal room stayed little small thoroughly pleased satisfied stay mercure rooms others mentioned clean linens relatively new thought bed comfortable well location pretty convenient wherever want go amsterdam felt safe neighborhood dont expect 5star accommodations want decent hotel make stay enjoyable would definitely consider location next time go amsterdam certainly look stay

Reviews.Title: “Great customer service”
Reviews.Author: DevonWinelover
Reviews.Content: hotel really well situated close heineken experience museums nice restaurants well easy walk centre amsterdam whole hotel nicely decorated room small comfortable clean staff polite helpful little reason ask anything problem room always hot us ac didnt seem effective also deal wed booked didnt include breakfast going charge us breakfast two people everyday luckily didnt said hadnt breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Quiet, Clean”
Reviews.Author: JAthens
Reviews.Content: hotel near heineken experience restaurants coffee houses hotel clean front desk staff friendly helpful room small based us standards adequate

Reviews.Title: “Really nice hotel with cozy rooms”
Reviews.Author: Proxification
Reviews.Content: stayed part package deal turned pleasant hotel location good within easy walking distance everything street charming hotel clean room good sized nothing special hotel looking safe reasonably priced hotel nice area amsterdam stay

Reviews.Title: “Clean Hotel for the dollars”
Reviews.Author: DKVogel0810
Reviews.Content: choose hotel tripadvisor recommendation great choice best location nice quiet street service effective room clean spacious hotel recently renovated everything new breakfast breakfast room must summary back

Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel”
Reviews.Author: Poppi_MB
Reviews.Content: hotel quiet side street providing avoid school coming time 2 minute walk tram stop 10 minute walk centre reviewers stated present reception upgraded staff extremely friendly helpful including letting us use computer reception check return flight rooms larger london average style green red clear 60s style furniture breakfast excellent choice eat like city centre hotel expensive quiet convenient recommended

Reviews.Title: “Lovely and quiet location”
Reviews.Author: only1eebo
Reviews.Content: found mercure novotel exceeded expectations great value family small children great location near heineken experience beautiful spacious room helpful staff hard find single room 2 adults 2 children accomodate notice made reservations online got awesome rate didnt know theyd room 4 arrived fortunately room 4 twins open plenty space even beds breakfast filling although regular dining room construction side street noise helped us get earlier get way

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value”

Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights wanted nice hotel use base sightseeing around amsterdam ideal us got tram central station short walk hotel hotel tucked away residential streets nice away hustle bustle room good size big comfortable bed ensuite shower room small newly refurbished sightseeing came back room sleep good stay would definitely recommend bedrooms nice fresh recently refurbished good value money

Reviews.Title: “Cheap, clean and with amenities! (a/c in all rooms).”

Reviews.Content: mercure arthur frommer hotel booked triple room 3 single beds room along hotel seems newly renovated bathroom really nice beds extremely comfortable location wasnt best around 1520 minute walk central amsterdam area nice cafes bars could relax
